title: Django Defies Sartana (Western, 1970) Tony Kendall, George Ardisson | Full Movie | Subtitled

sources.title: Django Defies Sartana (Western, 1970) Tony Kendall, George Ardisson | Full Movie | Subtitled
sources.description:
Framed for a bank robbery, bounty killer Django's brother, Steve is lynched. Django hunts down Sartana, Steve's supposed accomplice, but finds him innocent also. The two men seek out the real robbers.

Director & Writer: Pasquale Squitieri
Stars: George Ardisson (Sartana), Tony Kendall (Django), José Torres (Loco / Il Muto)

Original title: Django sfida Sartana (1970) 
Also known as: Django Defies Sartana (USA) | Django Against Sartana (USA) | Django desafia a Sartana (Spain) | E gran desafio de Django y Sartana (Spain) | Django défie Sartana (France) | Omuz Omuza (Turkey) | Django utmanar Sartana (Sweden) | Rykande Revolvrar (Sweden) | Savuavat revolverit (Finland) | O Django prokalei ton Sartana (Greece) | Django Challenges Sartana | Souboj: Django vs. Sartana (Czech Republic) | Django desafia Sartana (Portugal)



This movie is available with French, Portuguese & Turkish dubbed audio options, and subtitled in overs 30 more languages.
